verses.text: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

similars.text: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:

verses.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

similars.text: And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baal-meon:
The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.

verses.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

similars.text: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
Ibhar also, and Elishua, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
And Jiphtah, and Ashnah, and Nezib,
And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

verses.text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

similars.text: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.
And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

verses.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

similars.text: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

verses.text: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

similars.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

verses.text: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

similars.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

verses.text: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

similars.text: And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.

verses.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

similars.text: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

verses.text: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

similars.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

verses.text: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

similars.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

verses.text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

similars.text: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
The brother of Michah was Isshiah: of the sons of Isshiah; Zechariah.
Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.

Then they came to Gedaliah to Mizpah, even Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan and Jonathan the sons of Kareah, and Seraiah the son of Tanhumeth, and the sons of Ephai the Netophathite, and Jezaniah the son of a Maachathite, they and their men.
The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
And he had brethren the sons of Jehoshaphat, Azariah, and Jehiel, and Zechariah, and Azariah, and Michael, and Shephatiah: all these were the sons of Jehoshaphat king of Israel.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.

verses.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;
And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
And Jiphtah, and Ashnah, and Nezib,
Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Shebam, and Nebo, and Beon,
Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,

And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, the porters.
Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
And Hazar-shual, and Beer-sheba, and Bizjothjah,

verses.text: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

similars.text: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,

And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
Ibhar also, and Elishua, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.

And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
And his brethren by Eliezer; Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.
Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.
And of the last sons of Adonikam, whose names are these, Eliphelet, Jeiel, and Shemaiah, and with them threescore males.
Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.
And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,
And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphalet.
The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,

And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.
Eliphelet the son of Ahasbai, the son of the Maachathite, Eliam the son of Ahithophel the Gilonite,
And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:

Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.

And his brethren by Eliezer; Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.
Of the sons of Izhar; Shelomith the chief.
Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,
And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Ben-hanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Ben-zoheth.
The sons of Shemaiah; Othni, and Rephael, and Obed, Elzabad, whose brethren were strong men, Elihu, and Semachiah.
Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah: of the sons of Michah; Shamir.
And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.
The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
And the sons of Shimei were, Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.
The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Ami.
And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.
Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
And of the last sons of Adonikam, whose names are these, Eliphelet, Jeiel, and Shemaiah, and with them threescore males.
And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
And the sons of Kohath by their families; Amram, and Izehar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;
And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.

verses.text: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.

similars.text: These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.
These were the renowned of the congregation, princes of the tribes of their fathers, heads of thousands in Israel.
And they went about in Judah, and gathered the Levites out of all the cities of Judah, and the chief of the fathers of Israel, and they came to Jerusalem.
These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.
These were the renowned of the congregation, princes of the tribes of their fathers, heads of thousands in Israel.

And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.

Now these are the chief of the province that dwelt in Jerusalem: but in the cities of Judah dwelt every one in his possession in their cities, to wit, Israel, the priests, and the Levites, and the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon's servants.

And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
And Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Of Heman: the sons of Heman; Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth:

verses.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

similars.text: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
Moreover the sons of Obed-edom were, Shemaiah the firstborn, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sacar the fourth, and Nethaneel the fifth,
And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
And his brethren by Eliezer; Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.
And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.
Eliphelet the son of Ahasbai, the son of the Maachathite, Eliam the son of Ahithophel the Gilonite,
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Meshelemiah were, Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,
Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

verses.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.

similars.text: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
